dashboard.nigociateParagraph: Negociate your salary internally or during job interviews to optimize your value on the market.
dashboard.PrivacyParagraph: People advisor is based in Switzerland. This means all user data is protected by strict Swiss privacy laws. We will never share your details without your consent.
dashboard.technologyParagraph: Our graphical database allows us to compare each profile with market standards and thus to predict the salary you could earn.
